languages.text: "Не имею ни малейшего, совсем абсолютно никакого, представления. Есть завещание, есть имя — вот и все. Может, это мой потерянный брат или сестра, которых отец настругал на стороне? Может, шлюха, скрасившая последние дни? Я так думаю, что старый сукин сын Капеллан знает, он про дела отца знал больше всех. Но он молчит".

"I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."
languages.original_text: "Не имею ни малейшего, совсем абсолютно никакого, представления. Есть завещание, есть имя — вот и все. Может, это мой потерянный брат или сестра, которых отец настругал на стороне? Может, шлюха, скрасившая последние дни? Я так думаю, что старый сукин сын Капеллан знает, он про дела отца знал больше всех. Но он молчит".

traits.locale_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe it's my long-lost brother or sister my father made on the side? Maybe it's a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always been in on Father's business, more so than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

"I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe it's my long-lost brother or sister my father made on the side? Maybe it's a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always been in on Father's business, more so than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

"I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

"I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

languages.text: “我根本不知道，一点都不知道。遗嘱里就写了这么个名字，仅此而已。或许这个人是我父亲的副手？或许是我根本不知道的兄弟姐妹？又或许是在他最后的日子里让他重振雄风的妓女？我感觉那个混蛋牧师应该知道，他比我们所有人都更了解我父亲的事情，但他始终都在保持沉默。”
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: “我根本不知道，一点都不知道。遗嘱里就写了这么个名字，仅此而已。或许这个人是我父亲的副手？或许是我根本不知道的兄弟姐妹？又或许是在他最后的日子里让他重振雄风的妓女？我感觉那个混蛋牧师应该知道，他比我们所有人都更了解我父亲的事情，但他始终都在保持沉默。”

languages.text: «No tengo ni la más remota idea. Nada. Hay un testamento, hay un nombre... y hasta ahí. A lo mejor nació de una aventura suya; un hermano o hermana que nunca haya conocido. O puede ser una prostituta que le alegrara sus últimos días. Me da la sensación de que ese canalla de Capellán lo sabe, porque siempre ha conocido mejor que nadie todos los asuntos de mi padre, pero no quiere soltar prenda».
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo ni la más remota idea. Nada. Hay un testamento, hay un nombre... y hasta ahí. A lo mejor nació de una aventura suya; un hermano o hermana que nunca haya conocido. O puede ser una prostituta que le alegrara sus últimos días. Me da la sensación de que ese canalla de Capellán lo sabe, porque siempre ha conocido mejor que nadie todos los asuntos de mi padre, pero no quiere soltar prenda».

languages.text: 「知らん。さっぱりわからないんだ。親父の遺書にはそいつの名前があるってことだけしか知らない。親父の隠し子で、俺の知らない兄か姉かもしれない。海賊業を引退した後に親父とよろしくやってたどこぞの恋人かもしれない。教戒官なら何か知ってるかもしれないな…あいつは誰よりも親父の仕事に関わってた。なのに、何も言わないんだよ」
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: 「知らん。さっぱりわからないんだ。親父の遺書にはそいつの名前があるってことだけしか知らない。親父の隠し子で、俺の知らない兄か姉かもしれない。海賊業を引退した後に親父とよろしくやってたどこぞの恋人かもしれない。教戒官なら何か知ってるかもしれないな…あいつは誰よりも親父の仕事に関わってた。なのに、何も言わないんだよ」

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht die geringste Ahnung. Null. Ein Testament, ein Name – mehr ist da nicht. Vielleicht ein Bastard meines Vaters, ein Bruder oder eine Schwester, von dem oder der ich nichts wusste? Vielleicht eine Hure, die ihm seine letzten Tage versüßt hat? Ich habe so das Gefühl, dass Ordenspriester, die alte Laus, Bescheid weiß. Er wusste schon immer mehr über Vaters Angelegenheiten als der Rest von uns. Aber er hält sich bedeckt."
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht die geringste Ahnung. Null. Ein Testament, ein Name – mehr ist da nicht. Vielleicht ein Bastard meines Vaters, ein Bruder oder eine Schwester, von dem oder der ich nichts wusste? Vielleicht eine Hure, die ihm seine letzten Tage versüßt hat? Ich habe so das Gefühl, dass Ordenspriester, die alte Laus, Bescheid weiß. Er wusste schon immer mehr über Vaters Angelegenheiten als der Rest von uns. Aber er hält sich bedeckt."

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Il y a un testament et un nom inscrit dessus, c'est tout. Il s'agit peut-être d'un bâtard de mon père, un frère ou une sœur dont j'ignore l'existence. Ou alors, ça pourrait être une catin qui lui a apporté du réconfort dans ses vieux jours. Chapelain le sait, lui, j'en suis presque certain. Ce vieux sacripant a toujours été au fait des affaires de mon père, plus que n'importe lequel d'entre nous, mais il ne veut rien dire. »
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Il y a un testament et un nom inscrit dessus, c'est tout. Il s'agit peut-être d'un bâtard de mon père, un frère ou une sœur dont j'ignore l'existence. Ou alors, ça pourrait être une catin qui lui a apporté du réconfort dans ses vieux jours. Chapelain le sait, lui, j'en suis presque certain. Ce vieux sacripant a toujours été au fait des affaires de mon père, plus que n'importe lequel d'entre nous, mais il ne veut rien dire. »

languages.text: "Zerre fikrim yok. Ortada bir vasiyet var, bir de isim. O kadar. Belki babamın gayrimeşru veledidir, hiç bilmediğim bir kardeşimdir. Belki son günlerinde onu hoşnut eden bir kaltaktır. İçimden bir ses o bitli Papaz'ın bir haltlar bildiğini söylüyor. Her daim babamın işlerini hepimizden iyi bilirdi. Fakat çenesini açmıyor."
languages.original_text: "I have absolutely no idea. Zero. There's a will, there's a name — that's it. Maybe they're my father's by-blow, some brother or sister I never knew I had? Maybe they're a whore who brightened his final days? I get the feeling that old louse Chaplain knows, he's always known more about Father's business than any of us. But he's keeping quiet."

traits.locale_text: "Hiçbir fikrim yok. Hiç. Vasiyet ve bir isim var, o kadar. Belki babamın gayrimeşru çocuğudur, hiç bilmediğim bir kardeşim vardır. Belki son günlerini aydınlatan bir kaltaktır. İçimden bir ses o aşağılık Papaz'ın bir şeyler bildiğini söylüyor. O her zaman babamın işlerini hepimizden daha iyi bilirdi. Fakat çenesini açmıyor."
